1541150.name: Rocha´s Golem
1541150.description:
Abient Gameplay in a Crazy world

Enter in a frenetic gameplay where you control a humanoid creature made of rocks, a golem, in a top vision adventure game with 4 distinct areas that you will have to go through. Your goal is to put an end to the corrupt creatures that appeared in your home, for this use your giant spike to smash the monsters and projectiles created from your rock body and destroy your enemies!

Randow challenges in Stages

-run through the stages of each nation shooting and surviving as many enemies as you can in order to acquire new weapons and materials as you delve deeper into your adventure

Survival Mode

-outrun a flood of enemies in survival mode for 30 minutes and be able to win titles for yourself

Fabulous magic

-Accumulate magic fragments, use the elements as part of your strength. The fire, The thunderbolt and water.

Sensational Mysteries

-try to solve all the mysteries that lurk in this land, where do monsters come from, who are you, whose voices do you hear?
